name: Observative
description:
The art has been a form to express things, portraying with detail, or something not so detailed, a lot of particular things about humanity and it’s destiny. From old times we have seen how society and culture turn the art in an historic document, that tells the changes of the life itself. Observative is a challenge of observation in detail to decipher the perspective of 4 Latin American artist whose artwork has travel around the world; and particularly the rooms of La Tertulia Museum in Cali, Colombia.

The game is inspired in the concept of perspective of the artist from Cali, Ever Astudillo. Through this it will reveal surrounds related with aspects of life and artwork like Omar Rayo, Antonio Segui and Liliana Porter, the first a Colombian Born in Valle del Cauca, as well as Astudillo, and the last two are Argentinians.

Instructions:

Press W, A, S, D to move around the map
Use the mouse to rotate the character
Left Click and the mouse to look around the character

When you get in the spot to find the right angle a zone will illuminate under you, from there you gotta move the camera to find the right spot.

After you find the right spot a new zone will open for you.  For better experience, use your headphones.

Good Luck!
